tool_description:
This Movies API contains the data of the best movies ever made in a very easy-to-use and organized format.

Great choice for REST API based Frontend Developer Projects.

In the case of accessing the complete list, the Cover image, Rank, Title, Thumbnail, Rating, Id, Year, Images, Description, Trailer, Genre, Director, Writer and ID of the movies are listed.

This is a lightweight web service, (REST interface), which provides an easy way to access our database.

An API (Application programming...
name: List Movies v3
title: List Movies v3

api_list.name: Movie Details
api_list.description: Returns the information about a specific movie

optional_parameters.name: movie_id
optional_parameters.description: The YTS ID of the movie or the IMDB ID

optional_parameters.name: imdb_id
optional_parameters.description: The YTS ID of the movie or the IMDB ID

optional_parameters.name: with_cast
optional_parameters.description: When set the data returned will include the added information about the cast

optional_parameters.name: with_images
optional_parameters.description: When set the data returned will include the added image URLs

api_list.name: Movie Parental Guides
api_list.description: Returns all the parental guide ratings for the specified movie
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://list-movies-v3.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/movie_parental_guides.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "list-movies-v3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://list-movies-v3.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/movie_parental_guides.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "list-movies-v3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Movie Suggestions
api_list.description: Returns 4 related movies as suggestions for the user

api_list.name: List Movies
api_list.description: Used to list and search through out all the available movies. Can sort, filter, search and order the results

optional_parameters.name: genre
optional_parameters.description: Used to filter by a given genre (See http://www.imdb.com/genre/ for full list)

optional_parameters.name: order_by
optional_parameters.description: Orders the results by either Ascending or Descending order.

optional_parameters.name: with_rt_ratings
optional_parameters.description: Returns the list with the Rotten Tomatoes rating included.

optional_parameters.name: sort_by
optional_parameters.description: Sorts the results by choosen value.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: used to see the next page of movies, eg limit=15 and page=2 will show you movies 15-30.

optional_parameters.name: query_term
optional_parameters.description: Used for movie search, matching on: Movie Title/IMDB Code, Actor Name/IMDb, Director Name/IMDb Code.

optional_parameters.name: quality
optional_parameters.description: Used to filter by a given quality.

optional_parameters.name: minimum_rating
optional_parameters.description: used to filter movie by a given minimum IMDB rating.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The limit of results per page that has been set.
